results.title: Concomitant methimazole-induced agranulocytosis and cholestatic jaundice in a young woman.
results.text_hl: As a result, she was initiated on @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Methimazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008713 @@@methimazole@@@ for management.

citations.NLM: Alcorn C, Subarajan P, Anderson J. Concomitant methimazole-induced agranulocytosis and cholestatic jaundice in a young woman. BMJ Case Rep. 2022 Aug 25;15(8):. PMID: 36007972
citations.BibTeX: @article{36007972, title={Concomitant methimazole-induced agranulocytosis and cholestatic jaundice in a young woman.}, author={Alcorn C and Subarajan P and Anderson J}, journal={BMJ Case Rep}, volume={15}, number={8}}

citations.NLM: Henderson CA, Shamy HK. Atenolol-induced pseudolymphoma. Clin Exp Dermatol. 1990 Mar;15(2):119-20. PMID: 2347102
citations.BibTeX: @article{2347102, title={Atenolol-induced pseudolymphoma.}, author={Henderson CA and Shamy HK}, journal={Clin Exp Dermatol}, volume={15}, number={2}, pages={119-20}}

results.title: Atenolol induced systemic lupus erythematosus syndrome.
results.text_hl: We report the first case of an illness resembling @DISEASE_Lupus_Erythematosus_Systemic @DISEASE_MESH:D008180 @@@idiopathic lupus erythematosus@@@, with @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@, @DISEASE_Pericarditis @DISEASE_MESH:D010493 @@@pleuropericarditis@@@, antinuclear antibodies and antidenaturated DNA antibodies after 18 months of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Gouet D, Marechaud R, Aucouturier P, Touchard G, Sudre Y, Preud'homme JL. Atenolol induced systemic lupus erythematosus syndrome. J Rheumatol. 1986 Apr;13(2):446-7. PMID: 3723506
citations.BibTeX: @article{3723506, title={Atenolol induced systemic lupus erythematosus syndrome.}, author={Gouet D and Marechaud R and Aucouturier P and Touchard G and Sudre Y and Preud'homme JL}, journal={J Rheumatol}, volume={13}, number={2}, pages={446-7}}

results.title: Diffuse rash and cough in elderly woman with a UTI.
results.text_hl: On physical exam, she had a @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ of 101.5 degrees Fahrenheit.

citations.NLM: Baird D, Bush RJ, Seehusen D. Diffuse rash and cough in elderly woman with a UTI. J Fam Pract. 2010 May;59(5):281-4. PMID: 20544049
